summary: New looks to Aela the Huntress and Lydia. Plus some combat behavior changes.
descriptionHtml:
I created this mod only for personal use, but I decided now to share it.
This mod changes the face and hair of both Aela and Lydia. I also did some changes to their inventory and combat behaviors;

* Aela now uses bows only (I think)
* Lydia is now a 1h dualwielder
* Their inventory has also changed, it\'s now empty, and you will probably see them naked at first meeting. This was done so I could change their equipment ingame to whatever I wanted ;)

I have no idea how this mod will work for others, so don\'t cry if nothing works or something is messed up :)

REQUIREMENTS
You will NEED the following addons for this to work;
UNP Body - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
UNPB Body (optional) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899
ApachiiSkyHair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Lovely Hairstyles - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7403

I HIGHLY recommend the follow mods to achieve the look in the pictures;
The Eyes of Beauty - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
Coverwoman (Look 3) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563
Detailed Lips - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/689
The Wilds ENB - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21123

INSTALLATION
Put the Data folder in you Skyrim main folder, and overwrite as usual.

UNINSTALL
Remove the files contained in this addon from your Skyrim folder (not the Data folder, but it\'s contents..)

COMPATIBILITY 
I have actually no idea, you have to try it.
author: ronz
